jtlshopplugin.Name: Sovendus Voucher Network and Checkout Benefits
jtlshopplugin.Description: Official Sovendus Voucher Network & Checkout Benefits plugin for JTL
jtlshopplugin.Author: Marcus Brandstaetter - Sovendus GmbH

Setting.Name: Enable Sovendus Austria
Setting.Description: When enabled, Sovendus Banner will be visible on the chekcout success page

Setting.Name: Traffic Source Number
Setting.Description: Please enter your Traffic Source Number you have received in your integration documentation

Setting.Name: Traffic Medium Number
Setting.Description: Please enter your Traffic Medium Number you have received in your integration documentation
